content:
# The current inventory shows that I have 1 transport belt, 5 coal, and 3 iron gear wheels, but no iron ore is available. 
# This means I cannot insert any iron ore into the furnace to start smelting iron plates.
# 
# To proceed, I need to gather some iron ore from a nearby resource patch. After collecting enough iron ore, I can return to the furnace and insert it for smelting.
# 
# I will now locate the nearest iron ore resource patch and move to it for harvesting.

# Finding the nearest iron ore resource patch.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Moving to the nearest iron ore patch.
